meanings.definition: The skill, ability, or expertise of a virtuoso.
meanings.sent1: Her virtuosities on the piano amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The virtuosities of the violinist were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent3: Despite his virtuosities in cooking, he still managed to burn the toast.
meanings.sent4: His virtuosities in negotiation were like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The virtuosities of the acrobat left everyone in awe.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being a virtuoso.
meanings.sent1: The virtuosities of the artist were evident in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: She aspired to reach the virtuosities of her favorite singer.
meanings.sent3: His virtuosities in video games were unmatched by anyone in the group.
meanings.sent4: The virtuosities of the dancer were like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: Witnessing the virtuosities of the magician was like seeing magic come to life.
